Articles.Content:
blah blah, I messed around a bit with the new RCS parts and came out with this, gets to space nicely and can land vertically using RCS thrusters

Parts from C7 and some other things, Mostly C7 though, I forgot the name of the other one if im honest

The -TB Is a testbed, made it to figure out balancing

Enjoy

Holy bovine, that\'s good! 8)

Dang, really need joysticks to work properly so can try this!
Consider: when you can redock - that will make a swell lander.. the wings won\'t do much on the moon.. but they could sure help on something with an atmosphere
Im using a x52 , Set the I-K Translate up/ down Axis to one of the trim knobs, Works just fine for me
I\'ve had great success mapping the RCS keys to the numpad. I\'m really liking the design. Good stuff.

I\'ve had great success mapping the RCS keys to the numpad. I\'m really liking the design. Good stuff.

Thank you C7, And I love the parts! ^^

Most of my creations use them.
Where did you get those RCS modules? By the way nice design. ;D
They are part of the C7 pack
